closedxml.title: ClosedXML
closedxml.shortDescription: Create, read and modify Excel files (.xlsx) in .NET without installing Microsoft Excel

content.intro: ClosedXML is a powerful .NET library that allows you to create, read and manipulate Excel files (.xlsx, .xlsm) without requiring Microsoft Excel installation. It provides an intuitive API based on OpenXML, perfect for generating Excel reports server-side or processing data in bulk.
